content: This is a great idea. I’ve been doing something similar with my blog — teaching people how to write more effectively and selling my own services that will add actual value to the writing community. Definitely not a get rich quick scheme, but I’m at least able to cut back hours at my sh*tty j-o-b. Learning new writing techniques, brushing up on grammar and forging relationships with other writers should not be the domain of the wealthy, so good on you Ms. Grimes for starting this inexpensive endeavor.
